name: nytimes
text:
In Opinion

Jonathan C. Lipson and Gerald Posner write that a trapdoor in the Justice Department deal with the Sacklers’ company might enable them to escape a full accounting of their part in the opioid epidemic. https://t.co/kX1Bv89YGB

name: nytimes
text: A noted prosecutor in the ’70s and later a defense lawyer in prominent cases, William Aronwald was a central figure in a time when organized crime in New York was particularly brazen. He has died at 79. https://t.co/Fr0ABNYzFp
